message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for such a high-quality product.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your budget constraints, but $120 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $160. How about we meet in the middle again, but this time at $140? I'm willing to compromise, but I really need to stay within my budget.
